rules:
    components-request-bodies-pascal-case:
        description: All definitions should be named with UpperCamelCase
        message: {{property}} is not UpperCamelCase. {{description}}. Fix by renaming the definition, eg. object -> Object.
        given: $.components.requestBodies
        severity: error
        then:
            field: @key
            function: casing
            functionOptions:
                type: pascal
                separator:
                    char: .
                    allowLeading: false
